person.persName: Adrian Miller (Hopkins Co., KY, druggist, grocer and soldier)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, druggist, clerk and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Miller and Nancy Miller. Student in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student and druggist in Hopkins County in 1860. Clerk in Hopkins County in 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from November 3, 1861.
